title: underline needs adjustment after setting font/glyph offset
body:
Hi,
I recently switched from X11 to Wayland and sway. On Wayland, I felt the font spacing between lines was too large. I adjusted it using the font offset and glyph offset until I found a configuration that looks good. I ending up with this font config:

```
  size: 7.5
  offset:
    x: 0
    y: -3
  glyph_offset:
   x: 0
   y: -2
```
The issue I'm now facing is that the underline is too high; it's almost a strike through. Is there a way to adjust where alacritty draws the underline? Thanks!

### System

OS: `Linux`
Version: `alacritty 0.11.0 (8dbaa0bb)`
Linux/BSD: `Wayland`
